rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space with a traditional Kerala-style entrance featuring stone thresholds and intricate wooden carvings. It aligns with Vastu principles ensuring energy flow from the west-facing plot.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living area that maximizes natural light and ventilation via large windows on the south and east walls. Traditional Kerala tiled flooring is used to enhance aesthetics.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room for convenient dining space. Windows facilitate cross ventilation in line with Vastu and natural light emphasis.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A functional kitchen with modern amenities integrated into a traditional setting. Natural lighting from the east side ensures proper ventilation, aligning with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1
rooms.description: A master bedroom featuring a spacious balcony on the south-western corner for relaxation and privacy. Designed to allow ample natural light and fresh air.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional bedroom with an integrated balcony along the western side to ensure morning sunlight and balanced ventilation.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A compact bathroom ensuring privacy. Vastu guidelines suggest positioning it in the north-east for optimal energy flow.

rooms.name: Studio Workspace
rooms.description: A dedicated area for creative work or leisure activities, integrating indoor-outdoor elements with a view towards the garden.

openings.description: Traditional wooden door with carved detailing enhancing the Kerala aesthetic.

openings.location: Living Room - South and East walls
openings.description: Large windows for maximizing natural light while following Vastu recommendations.
Strategically placed window ensuring proper ventilation and lighting.

openings.location: Bedroom Balconies - South-West and West corners
openings.description: Spacious balconies designed to provide privacy and natural light with views of the surrounding greenery.

openings.location: North side for two-car garage access
openings.description: Large garage door integrated into the north facade to accommodate two cars while maintaining energy flow according to Vastu principles.

additional_features.description: A courtyard for natural ventilation and as a social space. This feature is crucial in traditional Kerala architecture, allowing light and air circulation across the home.
Dedicated garden area that promotes relaxation and aligns with Vastu principles by enhancing the natural beauty of the west-facing plot.

plot_details.description: A 100x100 feet plot with a West-facing orientation. The design incorporates Vastu principles and traditional Kerala aesthetics.
